# Amount or value of goods

## Data requirements/sources
Dam operator may have records of cargo mass on vessels passing through the dam. Analyst could estimate the value with goods prices from various sources, including [USDA ERS](https://www.ers.usda.gov/data-products/food-price-outlook/summary-findings/).

## Citations
([Kuby et al. 2005](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.advwatres.2004.12.015))
